description: McZinc Hepta (Zinc Sulphate Heptahydrate): Zn = 21%, S= 10.5%.
application_rates: 3-5 Kg /acre, but if Zn deficiency symptom appears the dose may be doubled.; Uses McZinc Gold as broadcast during final land preparation & before sowing/transplanting.; In case of rice, this can be use as top dressing mixed with urea when the plant age is 20-25 DAT.; If didn't use during final land preparation, no tension, you can spray @ 30 gm / 10 Lit of water over the plants.; McZinc Gold can be mixed with any other fertilizers for use except Phosphate.
crops_pests: Rice, Wheat, Maize, Cotton, Tea, Mustard, Potato, Onion, Chili, Mango, Banana, Betel leaf, Brinjal, Cabbage, cauliflower etc.
crops: Rice, Wheat, Maize, Cotton, Tea, Mustard, Potato, Onion, Chili, Mango, Banana, Betel leaf, Brinjal, Cabbage, cauliflower
